Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
crewman \crew"man\ (kr[udd]"man), n. any member of a ship's crew.
Syn: sailor. [WordNet 1.5]
2. a member of a flight crew.
Syn: crew member. [WordNet 1.5]
3. a member of a work crew. [WordNet 1.5]
crewman n 1: any member of a ship's crew [syn: {sailor}] 2: a member of a flight crew [syn: {crew member}] 3: a member of a work crew
